Header.description: Displays the header of the portfolio with the developer's name and title.

About.description: Displays a brief introduction about the developer.

Contact.description: Displays contact information for the developer.

App.description: Main application component that combines Header, About, and Contact.

index.description: Entry point for the React application where the App component is rendered.

notes: Please ensure all missing files are submitted to set up and run the React app successfully.
